```{r}
library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))
imperviousness <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)

runoff_values <- storm_runoff(Ia = imperviousness, A = 182)

watershed_runoff <- data.frame(runoff_values, imperviousness)

watershed_plot <- ggplot(watershed_runoff, aes(x = imperviousness, y = runoff_values)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_line() 

print(watershed_plot)
```
